question.string: Who was vice-president under the president who authorized atomic weapons against Japan during World War II?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"atomic weapons"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/vicePresident> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which anti-apartheid activist was born in Mvezo?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"anti-apartheid activist"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/birthPlace> ?const. ?proj ?pbridge <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Mvezo>. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Which recipients of the Victoria Cross died in the Battle of Arnhem?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Battle of Arnhem"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/award> ?proj. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Where did the first man in space die?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Where" AND "first man in space"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/deathPlace> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which members of the Wu-Tang Clan took their stage name from a movie?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Wu-Tang Clan" AND "stage name"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/bandMember> ?proj. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Which writers had influenced the philosopher that refused a Nobel Prize?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Nobel Prize"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/influencedBy> ?const. ?proj a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Writer>. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Who composed the music for the film that depicts the early life of Jane Austin?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"music" AND "Jane Austin"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/composer> ?proj. ?proj a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Agent>. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which horses did The Long Fellow ride?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Long Fellow"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/raceHorse> ?const. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Of the people that died of radiation in Los Alamos, whose death was an accident?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"death" AND "people"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/deathPlace> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which building owned by the Bank of America was featured in the TV series MegaStructures?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Bank of America"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/owner> ?const. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Which buildings in art deco style did Shreve, Lamb and Harmon design?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Lamb and"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/architect> ?const. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Which birds are protected under the National Parks and Wildlife Act?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"National Parks and Wildlife Act"' 1000). ?proj a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Bird>. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Which country did the first known photographer of snowflakes come from?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"country"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/birthPlace> ?const. } LIMIT 12

question.string: List all the battles commanded by the lover of Cleopatra.
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"battles"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/commander> ?const. } LIMIT 12

question.string: Which actress starring in the TV series Friends owns the production company Coquette Productions?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Coquette Productions"' 1000). ?proj <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?const. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Gaborone is the capital of which country member of the African Union?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"country member" AND "African Union"' 1000). ?proj ?pbridge <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Gaborone>. } LIMIT 1

question.string: For which movie did the daughter of Francis Ford Coppola receive an Oscar?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Francis Ford Coppola"' 1000). ?proj a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. } LIMIT 1

question.string: At which college did the only American actor that received the César Award study?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"only American actor"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/award> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: In which city does the former main presenter of the Xposé girls live?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"former main presenter"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/residence> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Who plays Phileas Fogg in the adaptation of Around the World in 80 Days directed by Buzz Kulik?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"Phileas Fogg"' 1000). ?proj ?pbridge <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Buzz_Kulik>. } LIMIT 1

question.string: Who is the front man of the band that wrote Coffee & TV?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"front man"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/writer> ?proj. } LIMIT 1

question.string: A landmark of which city is the home of the Mona Lisa?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX text:<http://jena.apache.org/text#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?const text:query (<http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract> '"city"' 1000). ?const <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/ground> ?proj. } LIMIT 12
